channel.title: Mark Fischer's Sports Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Mark Fischer's Sports Blog

item.title: Russell Wilson will win the Broncos a Super Bowl
item.description: Man is it tough being a Broncos fan. Since Peyton Manning left after winning the Super Bowl in the 2015-2016 season, the Broncos have started 11 different QBâ€™s with a combined record of 39-58. I also struggle to mention the fact of 14-straight losses to the repulsive team in Kansas City. The Broncos are a storied franchise with multiple Super Bowl wins and is home to many great players, so something has to fall in their favor, right?

item.title: About Mark Fischer
item.description: Hello! My name is Mark Fischer and I am from Omaha, Nebraska. I graduated from Creighton Prep in 2017 and I am currently a senior undergraduate student at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln with an expected graduation date of fall 2022. I am studying sports media and communication and am open to all types of jobs in that field. My talents include writing, Adobe Creative Cloud, R studio, and managing social media on multiple platforms.
